channel.title: Packet Sniffing on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Packet Sniffing on TLDRBins

item.title: Network Discovery
item.description: Test Connectivity Linux Windows # Default ping indefinitely ping -c3 <TARGET> # Default traceroute <TARGET> # ICMP echo request traceroute -I <TARGET> # TCP traceroute -T <TARGET> # UDP (filter evasion) traceroute -U <TARGET> # Set src port (filter evasion) traceroute --sport=<SRC_PORT> <TARGET> # Set dest port (filter evasion) traceroute -p <DEST_PORT> <TARGET> # Default 5 pings ping <TARGET> # Default tracert <TARGET> # Check specific port Test-NetConnection <TARGET> -Port <TARGET_PORT> # With Active Directory Module Installed Get-ADComputer -Filter * | ForEach-Object { $_ | Select-Object Name, @{Name='IPAddress';Expression={(Test-Connection -ComputerName $_.
